TopicTitle: Roll on control surfaces is reversed.

Articles.Content:
Using a bunch of mods, will link the list. My shuttle is experiencing an issue where, for some reason, the roll is reversed when launched on the stack. Doesn't happen if the shuttle is launched from the runway, without the lifter. I need to disable all of the aerodynamic surfaces for my shuttle to fly properly. Can anybody help with this? Also, mod list: http://pastebin.com/raw.php?i=BqAp09EP

KSP: win32 1.0.4

Mods linked above

Reproduction steps unknown, but I'll link a bugged craft. Craft here. Also, SPH version
